All Classes

Class Description
Action
The Action enum represents a set of actions that a player AI agent may perform.
BattleArena
The BattleArena class contains the JavaFX application and all necessary dependencies.
GameState
The GameState class represents a snapshot of the environment at a specific round.
GameState.Direction
The Direction enum represents a set of 4-way directions.
GameState.EntityType
The EntityType enum represents a set of possible types an entity in the environment may be.
GameUtility
The GameUtility class represents a toolkit of utility functions available to the user.
OutOfBoundsException  
PlayerAI
The PlayerAI class represents the base class for all artificial intelligence agents for the Battle Arena game.
Vector2
The Vector2 class represents a a two-dimensional coordinate of integers, such as (x, y).
